question: How did Islam spread in Indo-pak area?
answer:
QUESTION
Any one person responsible?

Almighty Allah Ta?ala blessed the lands of Indo-pak with Islam after the army of Muhammad ibn Qaasim al-Thaqafi (RA) conquered parts of it. The conquest happened between the years 90 ? 95 Hijri. (al-I?laam biman fil hind minal a?alaam vol.1 pgs.34-36)

This marked the beginning of the spread of Islam in those lands.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
